activities: Click Sales, Inc. provides a wide variety of e-commerce, referral tracking, and affiliate management services enabling entrepreneurs to monetize their businesses online. In these cases, personal data is collected and shared between Click Sales, Inc. and the applicable client. There may be limited instances in which we own and process personal data collected from customers on our own behalf, rather than on behalf of a client. In all such instances, we obtain access to personal data for purposes such as operating processing payments, fulfilling orders, and providing customer care and other related services. As part of our own internal operations, we also may obtain personal data about employees and agents of our clients, suppliers and other business partners. We may use such personal data as necessary or appropriate in connection with the establishment, servicing and development of the applicable business relationship.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

personaldata: off-line, on-line, and manually processed data
